result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Jessica Krejcarek requests no action be taken as DE is represented by counsel and no motion has been filed by Atty Barth
received from defendant pro se re: bond reduction.
from the court re: Judicial Rotation on 8/1/22

Defendant Anthony D. Hill appeared with Attorney Michael Robert Barth.  Defendant in custody.   Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.   Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
from DE - Motion to Modify Conditions of Release

201PM    Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Michael Barth.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 10:30 am..   Bond continued as previously set (see previous bond entry). DEmotion to modify bond.  Arguments heard. Court denies motion. rb
to Modify Bond filed by DE.

Defendant Anthony D. Hill appeared with Attorney Aileen Henry.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Andrew Joseph Burgoyne appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Atty Henry has a conflict with this case with a witness and moves to withdraw.  Court grants motion and Atty Henry is withdrawn.   Atty to contact SPD to re-assign case.   Court tolls time for cause.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *No Weapons especially Firearms.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Treshawn T. and Hezekiah D.
